page.title: cRING Claim Tool
page.Please enter the account of Darwinia Cra: Please enter the account of Darwinia Crab Network to receive cRING
page.Success! Please copy the signature below: Success! Please copy the signature below, and [claim] in Darwinia Wallet
page.Please input the Darwinia address to be: Please input the Darwinia address to be queried

crosschain.title: Cross-chain Transfer
crosschain.Select Chain: Please confirm the network and connect to the wallet:
crosschain.claimEnd: Phase 1: Genesis swap has been closed
crosschain.The RING in genesis swaps will arrive af: The RING in genesis swaps will arrive after launching the Darwinia mainnet and will be sent to the destination account by Genesis Block.
crosschain.Cross-chain swaps at this stage will arr: Cross-chain swaps at this stage will arrive immediately (network delays may occur),but only support One-way swaps to the Darwinia main network.
Cross-chain swaps at this stage will arrive immediately (network delays may occur), and support two-way or multi-way swaps.
crosschain.Please be sure to fill in the real Darwi: Please be sure to fill in the real Darwinia mainnet account, and keep the account recovery files such as mnemonic properly.
crosschain.Confirmed！After Darwinia mainnet launche: Confirmed！After Darwinia mainnet launched, you will receive this cross-chain transfer.
crosschain.Please enter the destination account of: Please enter the destination account of Darwinia mainnet
crosschain.Please select Darwinia mainnet destinati: Please enter the account of Darwinia Network
crosschain.Please select Darwinia mainnet sender ac: Please select the account of Darwinia Network
crosschain.Please enter the account of Darwinia Cra: Please enter the account of Darwinia Crab Network to receive cRING
crosschain.Success! Please copy the signature below: Success! Please copy the signature below, and [claim] in Darwinia Wallet
crosschain.Note：Please keep at least {{fee}} as ext: Note: Please keep at least {{fee}} as extrinsic fee
crosschain.The transaction has been sent, please ch: The transaction has been sent, please check the transfer progress in the cross-chain history.
crosschain.Please make sure to fill in an Ethereum: After the transaction is confirmed, the account cannot be changed. Please do not fill in the exchange account.
crosschain.Please enter the destination account of: Please enter the destination account of Ethereum Network
crosschain.The transaction has been sent, the trans: The transaction has been sent, the transaction results can be tracked through the block explorer. No need to send the transaction repeatedly before the transaction result comes out.
crosschain.The amount exceeds the account available: The amount exceeds the account available balance
crosschain.The entered recipient account is incorre: The entered recipient account is incorrect
crosschain.d2e crosschain gas tip 1: · Please initiate a claim transaction of the Ethereum network in the "Cross-chain transfer history".
crosschain.d2e crosschain gas tip 2: · Each claim transaction of Ethereum is estimated to use 600,000 Gas.

crosschain_ethtron.claimEnd: Phase 1: Genesis cross-chain has been closed
crosschain_ethtron.The cross-chain transfers at this stage: The cross-chain transfers at this stage will arrive after launching the Darwinia mainnet and will be sent to the destination account by Genesis Block.
crosschain_ethtron.Cross-chain transfers at this stage will: Cross-chain transfers at this stage will arrive immediately (network delays may occur),but only support One-way transfers to the Darwinia main network.
Cross-chain transfers at this stage will arrive immediately (network delays may occur), and support two-way or multi-way transfers.
crosschain_ethtron.Please be sure to fill in the real Darwi: Please be sure to fill in the real Darwinia mainnet account, and keep the account recovery files such as mnemonic properly.

common.Ethereum network type does not match: Ethereum network type does not match
common.TRON network type does not match: TRON network type does not match
